title: Mandala Faces
summary: A collection of hand drawn mandala watch faces by Julie Erin Designs.
description: Mandala faces includes over 20 black and white as well as full colour premium designs.  It also includes several options for customization.All artwork is hand drawn and original, created by Julie Erin Designs. See http://blog.julieerindesigns.com for more information about the artist!These faces are unique, trendy and feminine. Features: - Highly customizable features and colors- Adjustable screen timeout (from 10 seconds to Always On if needed)- 12/24 hour modes- Date- Configurable and removable analog watch hands- Weather- Google Fit step counter- Watch battery indicator- Supports ambient mode including low-bit ambient and anti-burn in modesDesigned for round Android Wear watches:• Huawei watches• Motorola Moto 360 • Motorola Moto 360 Gen 2 (42mm and 46mm)• Asus ZenWatch• Asus ZenWatch 2• Huawei Watch• LG G Watch• LG G Watch R• LG Watch Urbane• Samsung Gear Live• Sony SmartWatch 3• TAG Heuer Connect • Fossil Q FOUNDEROnce you install the app, the watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch which may take several minutes. After that you will be able to select it from your watch or the Android Wear app on your phone.
descriptionHTML:
Mandala faces includes over 20 black and white as well as full colour premium designs. It also includes several options for customization.

All artwork is hand drawn and original, created by Julie Erin Designs.
See http://blog.julieerindesigns.com for more information about the artist!

These faces are unique, trendy and feminine.

Features:
- Highly customizable features and colors
- Adjustable screen timeout (from 10 seconds to Always On if needed)
- 12/24 hour modes
- Date
- Configurable and removable analog watch hands
- Weather
- Google Fit step counter
- Watch battery indicator
- Supports ambient mode including low-bit ambient and anti-burn in modes



Designed for round Android Wear watches:
• Huawei watches
• Motorola Moto 360
• Motorola Moto 360 Gen 2 (42mm and 46mm)
• Asus ZenWatch
• Asus ZenWatch 2
• Huawei Watch
• LG G Watch
• LG G Watch R
• LG Watch Urbane
• Samsung Gear Live
• Sony SmartWatch 3
• TAG Heuer Connect
• Fossil Q FOUNDER



Once you install the app, the watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch which may take several minutes. After that you will be able to select it from your watch or the Android Wear app on your phone.
comments: Never transferred to my watch or Android wear app. Read another review about slight delay but it's been 15+ hours. So disappointing.
Very attractive but not fully functional with Wear2 on Zenwatch 3.
Doesn't  work. Does not automatically transfer to my watch. Can't  find it.
A lovely set of watch faces with lots of options for customization.
Great! Beautiful designs what's not to like !
recentChanges: More backgrounds added. Now over 20 mandala backgrounds!
